alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Randolph; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 2:26PM CDT until March 31 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR RANDOLPH...NORTHWESTERN LAWRENCE AND SOUTHEASTERN SHARP COUNTIES... At 225 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northeast of Cave City, or 13 miles southeast of Ash Flat, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pocahontas... Black Rock... Imboden... Ravenden... Ravenden Springs... Annieville... Dalton... Attica... Smithville... Williford... Calamine... Ingram... Shannon... Birdell... Nelsonville... Sitka... Center... Poughkeepsie... Eleven Point... Ozark Acres... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
